WorkItem.Description:
In PDF files as created by PDF writer, merged cells are seen as extremely tall and narrow with line break after each character in the word.
 
Sample files have been attached:
1. Reproduction PHP-script
2. PDF writer output (.pdf)
3. Corresponding Excel2007 writer output for comparison (.xlsx)
 
Screenshots:
1. Generated PDF as seen in Acrobat Reader 8
http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/9558/writepdfadobereader0712qr7.png
 
2. Generated Excel 2007 output for comparison as seem in MS Office Excel 2007
http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/3783/microsoftexcelwritexlsxuw2.png
 
Environment:
PHPExcel: Latest source from SVN (change set 14451) 1.6.2+
WorkItem.Summary: PDF writer collapses column width for merged cells

Comments.Message: For now I am solving the problem by setting an explicit column width for the collapsed columns.
Problem is that merge cells width is actually not calculated. Will check for a fix to this.
Thanks, I really appreciate this fix. I have downloaded and tested, and it works correctly now.
